name: part_001
file: tmp_【#鷹嶺ルイ1周年LIVE】Growth ーこれが私の成長ー【3D LIVE】 [y-gW-iI1eAo]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_001.mov

scenes.description: Takane Lui addresses the audience during an MC segment.

subtitles.original: ...行きますよね
subtitles.english: ...will go, won't it?

subtitles.original: すべて すべて すべて任せて
subtitles.english: Leave everything, everything, everything to me.

subtitles.original: それをさせてよ 大事なことなの
subtitles.english: Let me do it, it's important.

subtitles.original: わかっているでしょう
subtitles.english: You understand, right?

subtitles.original: 四六時中 会いに行くの
subtitles.english: I'll go see you twenty-four-seven.

subtitles.original: 会えない めんどくさいまま 今日も明日も 過ぎてゆくのでしょう
subtitles.english: Unable to meet, in this annoying state, today and tomorrow will surely pass by.

subtitles.original: 仮面に水を上げましょう
subtitles.english: Let's give water to the mask.

subtitles.original: 時計の中 枯れたこと忘れてた
subtitles.english: Inside the clock, I'd forgotten it had withered.

subtitles.original: さあ ダダダ 黙れ 黙り給えよ
subtitles.english: Now, s-s-s-shut up, shut your mouth.

subtitles.original: 言えないね そんな強い言葉は
subtitles.english: I can't say it, such strong words.

subtitles.original: 少しだけ 静かにしてほしい ああ
subtitles.english: I just want it to be a little quiet, ah.

subtitles.original: 私たち 退屈
subtitles.english: We're bored.

subtitles.original: 今と未来 見たかったはずなのに
subtitles.english: Even though we were supposed to want to see the present and the future.

subtitles.original: 世界転々プクヤイヤイ 見えぬその日まで
subtitles.english: The world's changing, puku-yai-yai, until that day we cannot see.

subtitles.original: ドドド エーエー この世のことわり ヨヨヨイ
subtitles.english: Do-do-do, eh-eh, the truth of this world, yo-yo-yoi.

subtitles.original: 今 ゼンゼンブクサササ あなたの街中
subtitles.english: Now, zen-zen-buku-sa-sa-sa, in the middle of your town.

subtitles.original: かたち作るはバッテン 世界転々プクヤイヤイ
subtitles.english: Forming an X, the world's changing, puku-yai-yai.

subtitles.original: 果てぬその日まで ネネネコプクヤイヤイ
subtitles.english: Until that endless day, ne-ne-neko-puku-yai-yai.

subtitles.original: あなたの周りも ヨヨヨイ 限界ゼンゼンハクアレアレア
subtitles.english: Around you too, yo-yo-yoi, the limit is zen-zen-haku-are-are-a.

subtitles.original: 約束の地まで さあ掲げよバッテン
subtitles.english: To the promised land, now hold up the X.

subtitles.original: バッテンバッテンブクシラリン 天使のワインを開けましょう
subtitles.english: X, X, buku-shirarin, let's open the angel's wine.

subtitles.original: さあみんな 来てくれてありがとうございます！
subtitles.english: Now everyone, thank you for coming!

subtitles.original: 続けて歌うので 盛り上がっていきましょう！
subtitles.english: I'll keep singing, so let's get hyped!

subtitles.original: 声出せー！
subtitles.english: Give me some noise!

subtitles.original: 音楽 すりぃ 歌 鷹嶺ルイ
subtitles.english: Music: Three / Vocal: Takane Lui

subtitles.original: 腐りかけた心にI need you 噂のアルカロイド
subtitles.english: To a heart on the verge of rot, I need you, the rumored alkaloid.

subtitles.original: エゴロック 作詞・作曲：すりぃ
subtitles.english: Ego Rock / Lyrics & Composition: Three

subtitles.original: あだ名はネットのしゃれこうべ 掻き鳴らせディストーション
subtitles.english: Nicknamed the web's skull, strum that distortion.

subtitles.original: 付け焼き刃の侍が 乱れ打つ三段銃
subtitles.english: A makeshift samurai firing off a three-shot gun.

subtitles.original: 悲劇の歴史で踊ろうか ほら てんてこへんてこまいまい
subtitles.english: Shall we dance in a history of tragedy? Look, it's a frantic, hectic mess.

subtitles.original: 「はあ？」 僕の心はエゴロック 斜め45度のナンセンス
subtitles.english: "Huh?" My heart is Ego Rock, a 45-degree angle of nonsense.

subtitles.original: ノウハウ砕いてマンネリを 明日にバイバイバイ
subtitles.english: Crush the know-how, say bye-bye-bye to the rut tomorrow.

subtitles.original: 媚びへつらうその姿 吐き気の空模様
subtitles.english: That fawning figure of yours, it's a nauseating sky.

subtitles.original: シニカルな視線の雨 今日も両目を塞ぐふり
subtitles.english: A rain of cynical stares, pretending to cover both eyes again today.

subtitles.original: もっともっと声出せるでしょ！ 皆さん 行きますよ！
subtitles.english: You can give me even more noise! Everyone, here we go!

subtitles.original: ハイ！ハイ！ハイ！ハイ！
subtitles.english: Hey! Hey! Hey! Hey!

subtitles.original: おちゃらけ頭にI need you 巷のアルカロイド
subtitles.english: To a joking head, I need you, the street's alkaloid.

subtitles.original: あの子も流行りのインスタントショー 巻き散らせVIP
subtitles.english: That girl's also a trendy instant show, scatter that VIP status.

subtitles.original: うだつが上がらぬ侍が 未来断つ愛とか
subtitles.english: A samurai who never catches a break, with love that cuts off the future.

subtitles.original: 無残な歴史で歌おうぜ ほら ちゃんちゃらなんちゃらまいまい
subtitles.english: Let's sing in a cruel history, look, it's a ridiculous, silly mess.

subtitles.original: 「はあ？」 ロックな心で生きようか 真夏並みホットなミュージック
subtitles.english: "Huh?" Shall we live with a rock heart? Music as hot as midsummer.

subtitles.original: 恥を砕いて丸書いて 明日もワハハ
subtitles.english: Crush the shame, draw a circle, and laugh tomorrow too.

subtitles.original: ちゃれくささも癖になる はみ出し者だろう
subtitles.english: This playfulness becomes a habit, you're an outcast, right?

subtitles.original: リリカルな視線の雨 今日も両目を開くふり
subtitles.english: A rain of lyrical stares, pretending to open both eyes again today.

subtitles.original: 透明な感情は 染まるだけさ
subtitles.english: Transparent emotions just get dyed.

subtitles.original: だったら見て見ぬふりする 奴らを押し出せ
subtitles.english: In that case, push out the ones who pretend not to see.

subtitles.original: 人生かけても負けそうです 勝ち負け取り憑かれナンセンス
subtitles.english: Even if I bet my life, I'd probably lose; obsessed with winning or losing, it's nonsense.

subtitles.original: 1分砕いて常識を 未来にセーグッバイ
subtitles.english: Crush common sense for a minute, say goodbye to the future.

subtitles.original: 僕の心はエゴロック 斜め45度のナンセンス
subtitles.english: My heart is Ego Rock, a 45-degree angle of nonsense.

subtitles.original: ノウハウ砕いてマンネリを 明日にバイバイバイ
subtitles.english: Crush the know-how, say bye-bye-bye to the rut tomorrow.

subtitles.original: 媚びへつらうその姿 吐き気の空模様
subtitles.english: That fawning figure of yours, it's a nauseating sky.

subtitles.original: シニカルな視線の雨 今日も両目を塞ぐふり
subtitles.english: A rain of cynical stares, pretending to cover both eyes again today.

subtitles.original: One, two, three, fuck you!
subtitles.english: One, two, three, fuck you!
